lessons.japanese: くそー、渚のやつ、本当に先生にチクりやがった。
lessons.english: Dammit, that pest Nagisa, she really went and snitched on me to the teachers.

lessons.japanese: 渚に人が群がっていた。
lessons.english: There were flocks of people on the beach.

lessons.japanese: 渚に人が群がっていた。
lessons.english: People gathered at the water's edge.

lessons.japanese: 渚に人が群がっていた。
lessons.english: There were a lot of people on the beach.

lessons.japanese: 渚に人が群がっていた。
lessons.english: There were flocks of people on the beach.
